scripts.install: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.watch: npm run start --prefix client && npm run start:dev --prefix server
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server && npm run start:prod --prefix server
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix client && npm run format --prefix server

*.(ts): npm run lint && npm run format
